platforms.name: Kaleido
platforms.description: Kaleido is an enterprise-grade video understanding AI platform that automatically analyzes, indexes, and extracts insights from video content at scale. It processes visual, audio, and text elements simultaneously to enable powerful search, summarization, content moderation, and compliance workflows. Its unique selling point is its multimodal, frame-accurate analysis engine designed specifically for large-volume enterprise video libraries.
keyFeatures: Frame-accurate object, scene, and activity detection with timestamped metadata
Audio transcription with automatic speaker diarization (identifies who said what)
Sentiment and emotion analysis derived from both visual cues and audio tone

platforms.name: Windsor 2.0
platforms.description: Windsor 2.0 is an enterprise-grade AI video localization platform that specializes in ultra-realistic dubbing and voice cloning. It goes beyond simple translation by using proprietary AI to preserve the original speaker's unique vocal emotions, tone, and even synchronize lip movements in the translated video. Its primary target audience includes global media companies, e-learning providers, and enterprise marketing teams who require studio-quality, scalable localization while maintaining the authenticity of the original content.
keyFeatures: Emotion & Tone-Preserving Voice Cloning (proprietary 'Vocal Identity' AI)
AI-Powered Lip-Sync Adjustment for 50+ target languages
Batch Processing for long-form content (e.g., full courses, film dubs)
